verses.text: That \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we have seen \w with|strong="G3708"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we have looked \w upon|strong="G2300"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* have \w handled|strong="G5584"\w*, \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w Word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*;

(\w For|strong="G2532"\w* the \w life|strong="G2222"\w* was \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we have \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \add it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bear \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w shew|strong="G0518"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w that|strong="G2222"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was \w manifested|strong="G5319"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w*;)

That \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we have \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* declare \w we|strong="G0518"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* may \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w truly|strong="G1161"\w* \w our|strong="G2251"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* \add is\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* write \w we|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w full|strong="G4137"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w message|strong="G0031"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w declare|strong="G0312"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4653"\w* at \w all|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* we \w say|strong="G2036"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, we \w lie|strong="G5574"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w light|strong="G5457"\w*, we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w cleanseth|strong="G2511"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* we \w say|strong="G2036"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, we \w deceive|strong="G4105"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* we \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w forgive|strong="G0863"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \add our\add* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w cleanse|strong="G2511"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* we \w say|strong="G2036"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w have|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*, we \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w liar|strong="G5583"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*.
